name: habittrove
description: HabitTrove is a simple self-hosted habit-building app that lets users create tasks, track consistency, and view streaks with an attractive mobile-friendly web interface.

features.title: Simplicity
features.description: Clean interface, Easy setup, No complexity. Start tracking instantly

features.title: Streaks
features.description: Visual streak tracking, Consistency metrics, Motivation system. Build momentum

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive design, Touch-friendly, Fast loading. Perfect for phones

features.title: Tasks
features.description: Daily habits, Custom schedules, Flexible tracking. Adapt to your life

features.title: Progress
features.description: Visual indicators, Completion rates, Historical data. See your journey

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Fast performance, Minimal resources, Quick access. No bloat

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control, Privacy-first, Your data. Own your habits

features.title: Free
features.description: Open source, No subscriptions, Community-driven. Always free
